item.title: Blogging using Jupyter notebooks
item.description: Hello world! In [4]: 1+1 Out[4]: 2 \begin{equation} F\left(t\right)=\int_{0}^{t}\frac{1}{2}x^{2}\,\mathrm{d}x \end{equation} In [5]: using Plots In [9]: x = range(0, stop=2*pi, length=50) y = sin.(x) plot(x, y) Out[9]: 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 -1.
